title: Looking for Plat + A.D.C
body:
POSTING FROM AN ALT ACCT, but currently G3 on my main, Was P2 last season support only and looking to climb again,
mains Janna raka taric tahm but not limited to who i can use, long time player with wide game knowledge and a mature attitude
focussed on winning games? send me a friend request and ill give you a reply .
good luck summoners and have fun !~   
Foulfumes.
